rules_text:
When The Day of Unity enters, search your library for an enchantment card, reveal it, put it into your hand, then shuffle.
Whenever The Day of Unity attacks, you may discard a card. When you do, you may cast target Aura card from your graveyard targeting The Day of Unity.
